channel.title: Nodemcu on Krishna Kumar T
channel.description: Recent content in Nodemcu on Krishna Kumar T

item.title: In Meeting Indicator
item.description: So many of you have gotten accustomed to work from home by now. This pandemic has thrown a lot of challenges at our face when most of us are not ready for. While Work From Home is kind of boon, living with it for a long time comes with its own unique challenges. One of the simplest challenge I have faced in the initial days was to make my family understand that I am in a meeting where Mic/Camera/both are activated.
